text: Rodolphe Belmer (born 21 August 1969) is the chairman and CEO of TF1.Rodolphe Belmer, futur patron de TF1, quitte le conseil d'administration de Netflix He graduated from HEC Paris.Rodolphe Belmer : Rencontre du deuxième type Previously, he has been CEO of Atos and Eutelsat.Rodolphe Belmer va prendre la tête d'Atos == Awards == * Ordre des Arts et des Lettres == References == Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of HEC Paris Category:French businesspeople Category:People from Rennes
title: Rodolphe Belmer
